mapper.select:
SELECT A.NM AS ATC_NM , A.YYYY||'년' AS D_YEAR -- 년 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '01' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96') ) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '01' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '01', 1)),0) END AS M01 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '02' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '02' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '02', 1)),0) END AS M02 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '03' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '03' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '03', 1)),0) END AS M03 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '04' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '04' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '04', 1)),0) END AS M04 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '05' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '05' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '05', 1)),0) END AS M05 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '06' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '06' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '06', 1)),0) END AS M06 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '07' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '07' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '07', 1)),0) END AS M07 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '08' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '08' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '08', 1)),0) END AS M08 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '09' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '09' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '09', 1)),0) END AS M09 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '10' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '10' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '10', 1)),0) END AS M10 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '11' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '11' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '11', 1)),0) END AS M11 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', 1)),0) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', 1)),0) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (MM = '12' AND PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (MM = '12' AND PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', PR)),0) ELSE NVL(SUM(DECODE(MM, '12', 1)),0) END AS M12 , CASE WHEN A.NM = '4' THEN (CASE WHEN #{baseY} <= 2015 THEN COUNT(1) * 27995 WHEN #{baseY} >=2016 AND #{baseY} <= 2018 THEN COUNT(1) * 26654 WHEN #{baseY} >=2019 THEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (PD_GRP_CD NOT IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 26748 WHEN (PD_GRP_CD IN ('5','7','8','9', '91', '93', '95', '96')) THEN 32277 ELSE 0 END),0) END) WHEN A.NM = '5' THEN SUM(PR) ELSE COUNT(*) END AS TOTAL_CNT , 0 AS MAX_VAL , 0 AS MIN_VAL , 0 AS AVG_VAL FROM ( SELECT '1' AS NM -- A/S건 , SV_MNGT_TP_CD AS TYP -- 구분 , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,5,2) AS MM , 0 AS PR , VS161.PD_CD AS GDS_CD , PD_GRP_CD AS PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_SVPD_QLTY_MNGT_AS_DTL_IZ VS161 WHERE WK_PROCS_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' AND ((WK_PROCS_YM < '201901' AND (IMPTA_RSON_NM IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6') OR IMPTA_RSON_NM IS NULL)) OR (WK_PROCS_YM >= '201901' AND (BAD_DV_CD IN ('100R','500R','400R','700R') OR BAD_DV_CD IS NULL))) AND TRIM(PD_GRP_CD) != '11' AND ((SV_PROCS_FOM_CD != '114A') OR (SV_PROCS_FOM_CD IS NULL))
UNION ALL
SELECT '2' AS NM --렌탈 계정(수) , T1.SELL_TP_CD AS TYP , SUBSTR(MNGT_YM,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(MNGT_YM,5,2) AS MM , 0 AS PR , PDCT_PD_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ AC202 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 ON T1.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD != '401' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T2.PD_CD = PDCT_PD_CD AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 != '11' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D T5 /*코드상세, ST101_ITEM_GR*/ ON T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = T5.CD_VLD_VAL AND T5.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T5.CD_ID = 'PD_GRP_CD' AND T5.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND MNGT_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS NM --A/S율(%) , '' AS TYP , #{baseY} AS YYYY , '' AS MM , 0 AS PR , '' AS GDS_CD , '' AS PD_GRP_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS NM -- 엔지니어비용 , SV_MNGT_TP_CD AS TYP -- 구분 , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,5,2) AS MM , 0 AS PR , VS161.PD_CD , PD_GRP_CD AS PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_SVPD_QLTY_MNGT_AS_DTL_IZ VS161 WHERE WK_PROCS_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' AND ((WK_PROCS_YM < '201901' AND (IMPTA_RSON_NM IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6') OR IMPTA_RSON_NM IS NULL)) OR (WK_PROCS_YM >= '201901' AND (BAD_DV_CD IN ('100R','500R','400R','700R') OR BAD_DV_CD IS NULL))) AND TRIM(PD_GRP_CD) != '11' AND ((SV_PROCS_FOM_CD != '114A') OR (SV_PROCS_FOM_CD IS NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS NM -- 부품비용 , SV_MNGT_TP_CD -- 구분 , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,1,4) AS YYYY , SUBSTR(WK_PRCSDT,5,2) AS MM , NVL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' OR SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '2' OR SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '3' THEN PDCT_UPRC ELSE 0 END) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ ST163 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS ST101 ON ST101.PD_CD = ST163.ITM_PD_CD AND ST101.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND ST101.PD_TP_DTL_CD = '02' WHERE ST163.CNTR_NO = VS161.CNTR_NO AND ST163.CNTR_SN = VS161.CNTR_SN AND ST163.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS161.CST_SV_ASN_NO) , 0) AS PR , VS161.PD_CD , PD_GRP_CD AS PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_SVPD_QLTY_MNGT_AS_DTL_IZ VS161 WHERE WK_PROCS_YM LIKE #{baseY}||'%' AND ((WK_PROCS_YM < '201901' AND (IMPTA_RSON_NM IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6') OR IMPTA_RSON_NM IS NULL)) OR (WK_PROCS_YM >= '201901' AND (BAD_DV_CD IN ('100R','500R','400R','700R') OR BAD_DV_CD IS NULL))) AND TRIM(PD_GRP_CD) != '11' AND ((SV_PROCS_FOM_CD != '114A') OR (SV_PROCS_FOM_CD IS NULL)) )A GROUP BY A.NM , A.YYYY||'년' ORDER BY NM
